Laporan Dari Jepang
FOTO: Kendaraan dan Robot di Olimpiade dan Paralimpiade 2020
01 Nov 2019, 05:32 by M. Ikhsan, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Toyota menurunkan sejumlah kendaraan 'cerdas' di Olimpiade dan Paralimpiade Tokyo 2020. Kendaraan-kendaraan ini untuk mobilitas para atlet, staf dan pengunjung.


Access People Mover (APM) bisa mengangkut satu kursi roda. Kendaraan ini dirancang khusus untuk mendukung perhelatan Olimpiade dan Paralimpide Tokyo 2020.



Bus Fuel Cell atau kendaraan berbahan bakar gas hidrogen ini dilengkapi Intelligent Transport Systems atau ITS untuk meningkatkan keamanan penumpang.



Toyota Ultra Compact BEV (Battery Electric Vehicle) dengan dimensi panjang 2.490 mm, lebar 1.290 mm, dan tinggi 1.550 mm. Klaim Toyota, kendaraan ini cuma bisa bergerak dengan kecepatan maksimal 60 km per jam.



Toyota LQ dilengkapi teknologi otonom dan fitur 'Yui', fitur kecerdasan buatan yang disebut dirancang untuk memahami pengemudi serta memberikan pengalaman berkendara terbaik.



Toyota e-Palette dilengkapi sistem mengemudi otomatis yang dirancang menggunakan perangkat keras, lunak, dan sensor canggih seperti kamera dan LiDAR. Teknologi otonom bus kecil ini diklaim setara level 4.



Mirai Fuel Cell atau kendaraan berbahan bakar gas hidrogen untuk mobilitas selama Olimpiade dan Paralimpiade Tokyo 2020.



Field Support Robot (FSR) akan membantu para atlet khususnya cabang atletik nomor lempar. Robot FSR dengan navigasi otomatis akan mengumpulkan benda-benda seperti lembing atau martil yang dilempar atlet.



Human Support Robot (HSR) dengan navigasi otomatis akan melayani manusia seperti mengambil dan membawa benda seperti botol minuman. Alat ini potensi digunakan dalam Olimpiade dan Paralimpiade Tokyo 2020.

Report from Japan
PHOTO: Vehicles and Robots at the 2020 Olympics and Paralympics
01 Nov 2019, 05:32 by M. Ikhsan, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia
Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Toyota unloaded a number of 'smart' vehicles at the 2020 Tokyo Olympics and Paralympics. These vehicles are for the mobility of athletes, staff and visitors.


Access People Mover (APM) can transport one wheelchair. This vehicle is specially designed to support the Tokyo 2020 Olympics and Paralimpide events.



The Fuel Cell bus or hydrogen gas-powered vehicle is equipped with Intelligent Transport Systems or ITS to improve passenger safety.



Toyota Ultra Compact BEV (Battery Electric Vehicle) with dimensions of length 2,490 mm, width of 1,290 mm and height of 1,550 mm. Toyota claims, this vehicle can only move with a maximum speed of 60 km per hour.



Toyota LQ is equipped with autonomous technology and the 'Yui' feature, an artificial intelligence feature called designed to understand the driver and provide the best driving experience.



The Toyota e-Palette is equipped with an automatic driving system that is designed using hardware, software, and sophisticated sensors such as cameras and LiDAR. This small bus autonomous technology is claimed to be level 4 equivalent.



Mirai Fuel Cell or hydrogen gas fueled vehicles for mobility during the 2020 Tokyo Olympics and Paralympics.



Field Support Robot (FSR) will help athletes especially the athletic branch throwing numbers. FSR robots with automatic navigation will collect objects such as javelins or hammerheads thrown by athletes.



Human Support Robot (HSR) with automatic navigation will serve humans like taking and carrying objects such as drink bottles. This tool has the potential to be used in the 2020 Tokyo Olympics and Paralympics.
